Nurpu HD
programme.desc: Join the Teton Gravity Research crew for a dive into the wild world of whitewater kayaking.

programme.title: Ice Edge
programme.desc: Ice Edge is a short documentary about a group of surfers trying to make surfboards out of ice. It follows the process from freezing the boards, shaping them and taking them out into the sea. There is a lot of trying and failing. Will it work at all? The boards are slippery, and they melt very fast. Everything needs to work simultaneously: The surfers must be ready. The boards cannot crack. The perfect wave must come. Ice Edge is a film where nature and people play together.

programme.title: Seward
programme.desc: Tag along as TGR takes an amazing crew of new-school backcountry jibbers including Sage Cattabriga-Alosa and Kye Petersen to the pristine, ocean-view mountains of Seward, Alaska to see how they will use the landscape.

programme.title: Following Your Passions HD
programme.desc: Two legends of action sports Jeremy Jones and Selema Masekela sit down for an honest conversation about their careers and problems facing not only the action sports community but the world.

programme.title: Kakapo Crest
programme.desc: Tasmanian climbers Liz Oh and Rosie Hohnen are persuaded by filmmaker Olivia Page and a local kiwi stoat trapper, Ana Richards, to hike off-track deep into remote Fiordland, New Zealand, in search of a sabre-like peak. They surrender themselves to Ana's confidence in navigating them through terrain few have crossed, and in parts never traversed at all. They battle through vertical plants, gale force storms and dangerously loose rock - but not without humor.

programme.title: Connection HD
programme.desc: A highline project organized by passionate woman all around the globe. Eight girls decide to rig a half a kilometer long highline between two iconic rock towers in the Moab desert in Utah.

programme.title: Kayaking in the Laurentian Mountains
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he heads to the adventure-filled region of Québec that gets its' name from a chain of mountains the runs through it—the Laurentians. Join Ken as he explores the islands of Lac Poisson Blanc by sea kayak before putting his whitewater kayaking skills to the test on one of Eastern Canada's most popular rivers, the Rouge River.

programme.title: The Yukon Blues
programme.desc: Igor D’India’s epic journey down the Yukon River, across Canada & Alaska. 16000 km hitch-hiking and nearly 2000 km solo paddling with an “old-fashioned” approach to adventure. Without any assistance, radio, GPS or phone, just some solar panels to re-charge his audio/video equipment.

programme.title: All Or Nothing 2 HD
programme.desc: All Or Nothing 2 is a self supported project for the love of 2 wheel sports, filmed in the first six months of 2014 in countries such as Andorra, England, Portugal and Spain.

programme.title: Goodwood: Festival of Speed
programme.desc: The Goodwood Festival of Speed is an annual motorsports festival featuring modern and historic motor racing vehicles taking part in a hill climb and other events

programme.title: The 900 Series
programme.desc: Brant starts season 2 with another black 928 US edition; Ramon hangs out at Las Vegas Autofest; Blake replaces an important safety component

programme.title: Sams Garage
programme.desc: New season and a peek at SEMA 2023

programme.title: Bike World
programme.desc: Chad's recent ride on the CFMOTO 450 MT sparked our interest in the Chinese brand, so Chris has spent some time on the 800 NK,Is the new Yamaha MT-09 SP worth the extra money?

programme.title: The Chameleon - 24HR Nurburgring
programme.desc: The 24-hour race on the legendary Nürburgring-Nordschleife is probably the largest motorsport event in the world. With this breathtaking documentary, filmmaker Jan Birkenstock follows all the action

programme.title: MotoAmerica: Mission King of the Baggers
programme.desc: Baggers, brawls, and bar-to-bar battles—Race 1 at Road America was a King Of The Baggers classic.

programme.title: F4 Championship: Saudi Arabia
programme.desc: The 2024 Formula 4 Saudi Arabian Championship is the first season of the championship. The championship is a 6-event, 24-race series that will visit Bahrain, Kuwait, Qatar, and Saudi Arabia.

programme.title: Garden Party
programme.desc: Ready to dig in and grow your green thumb? Join us for a delightful hour of expert-led gardening tutorials designed to inspire and educate gardeners of all levels. From essential planting tips and soil secrets to creative container gardening and vibrant floral arrangements, our seasoned instructors will guide you through every step. Whether you're a seasoned horticulturist or just starting out, you'll find fresh ideas and practical techniques to cultivate the garden of your dreams.

programme.title: Lettering
programme.desc: Today we take a very personal approach using our names and monograms. Our first projects are monogram ornaments made from air dry clay. Then make initial letter necklaces for you and your friends. Today's art journal technique is lettering -- learn some tips for simple calligraphy. Finally make an initial bulletin board covered with initials and doodle art.

programme.title: Sci-Fi
programme.desc: Travel to the future for new adventures. Jenny Barnett-Rohrs makes a metallic robot tray to hold coins and treasures. Then, she creates a mysterious sea creature. Franz Spohn launches aliens into outer space and Jenny makes futuristic sculptures from foam.

programme.title: Drawing & Painting
programme.desc: Learn to draw and paint with CraftsyTV.

programme.title: Baking
programme.desc: Learn to bake with CraftsyTV

programme.title: 3 Designs Every Quilter Should Know
programme.desc: This practical and cute quilted zipper pouch is one of Angela's favorite projects yet, because it skips the piecing and gets straight to the quilting! In this episode, she shares three quilting designs every quilter should know: ribbon candy, serpentine lines and the paisley feather, while making a small, easy quilting project for beginners that only requires two fat quarters to make!

programme.title: Frequency Rainbow Star Quilt
programme.desc: What do you get when you combine a rainbow quilt, a star quilt and a medallion quilt all into one? A fresh episode of "The Midnight Quilt Show," of course! Join Angela as she breaks down Y-seams, quilting with templates and beyond.

programme.title: Uncle David's Lonely
programme.desc: Uncle David is excited to live in his son's new home in New Rochelle, NY, but after frequently finding himself alone there, he misses the lively atmosphere of the Goldbergs' Bronx apartment. First Broadcast: 9/7/1954.

programme.title: Cousin Muttel Wants A Job
programme.desc: Cousin Muttel comes to the Goldbergs and asks for a job in Jake's dress factory. Jake thinks that Muttel is a bad businessman and resists hiring him, but Molly insists. First Broadcast: 9/14/1954.

programme.title: Muttel Taking Advantage
programme.desc: Cousin Muttel arrives at Molly's house, claiming to have a heart condition. As his stay drags on, the family suspects that Muttel is taking advantage of them. First Broadcast: 10/12/1954

programme.title: President Molly
programme.desc: Molly finds herself conflicted when she is nominated to be President of the Ladies Auxiliary Committee, a position which her friend also wants. First Broadcast: 10/19/1954.

programme.title: Social Butterfly

programme.title: Shriners - Transforming Lives

programme.title: Beauty Parlor

programme.title: Rosie's Nose
programme.desc: Rosie is convinced that her nose is too big and secretly starts to save money for plastic surgery. The family is horrified by the prospect, so Molly concocts a plan to try and change Rosie's mind. First Broadcast: 10/27/1955.

programme.title: Naayagi Episode 29
programme.desc: Nayagi is a 2018 Indian Tamil-language Family Drama series. It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. programme.desc: Deivamagal is an Indian Tamil-language soap opera starring Vani Bhojan and Krishna. Kumarans successful soap, Thirumathi Selvam, and replaced by Nayagi. The show is produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S. Kumaran. programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: The Speed record
programme.desc: MewMew has a new stopwatch and wants to time everything that everyone does, to get to them to do it at record speed. Life in Abra-Dabra becomes intolerable as everyone tries to be quicker than the next person. Eventually Deedee and the others persuade MewMew to break all his speed records. When he achieves it no one applauds him, so MewMew realises that many things are better done in their own sweet time. He also realises that by doing everything fast, he is missing out on enjoying many things.

programme.title: MARDANA MURGA
programme.desc: Not too far from the Hotel California, a muscular six-pack rooster escapes from a chicken truck and to everyone surprise he loves Chai Rajas Banana Fries. Sundar decides to use him against Basha. Now Basha has to outwit the duo and get the rooster back into that chicken truck.

programme.title: Dolphin Tales
programme.desc: Dunky has taken a small picnic bag and takes Keet to the lake. A nice day as by the lake very peaceful. Keet sees two dolphins in the lake and plays with them as they get friendly with each other. The prowling Cat is not too happy. And tries various antics to catch Keet with funny results. The dolphins become good friends with Keet and teach Cat a lesson to remember for a longtime

programme.title: Super Hero Don
programme.desc: Don get super powers when he gets thrown to another planet. And when he returns, it is a tough time for Larry Marly and Charly. Now it is the reign of Don - the super hero. But, it all changes when the rats get super powers!! gosh! What will happen to Don now???

programme.title: Shivery Timbers
programme.desc: Mildred the ghost has had just about enough of the Creepy Candys noisy shenanigans and wants the library quiet.It is then the Creepy Candy find a secret treasure map and decide to follow it. The clues lead our daring swashbucklers on a high seas adventure of danger and mystery.Will they discover a hidden treasure? What will it begold, jewels, chocolate? Will Mildred ever be happy? Watch this exciting episode of Shivery Timbers and find out!

programme.title: Mango Season
programme.desc: It’s the mango season and Dunky has to guard all the mangoes so that no one will steal them. He has taken the help of Cat and Keet to guard them from Hoodie and the mean cat gang.

programme.title: Non Stop Dance Party
programme.desc: Melody creates a tune so catchy that she puts all the Smighties into a trance. Its up to her to now save the day and stop the villains with her powerful music.

programme.title: FIRST COME FIRST SERVE
programme.desc: Sundar wakes up late and finds a glaring Chai Raja stand towering over him. He rushes to take his station as business begins but alas his headache is about to get much worse for Basha has decided to sabotage each and every customer who walks in Chai Rajas door that day. To make matters worse, a wrestler turns up at the shop and demands that he be the one to be served first always. Chai Rajas rhythm is distorted by the wrestlers hankering and all goes for a toss. Basha disguises and manages to grab the wrestlers attention who now demands that Sundar serve Basha. But Sundar finds out its Basha and chases him. The lovestruck wrestler, woebegone at losing his love punches Sundar into orbit while Basha looks on gleefully.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Gummy, Harry and Kala head off to a scary Halloween costume party – but the winner of the ‘Best Costume’ prize.... isn’t wearing a costume, and is actually a real monster!

programme.title: Cruise Blues
programme.desc: On the deck of the cruise, Titanic-style Don and Colonel stand facing the sea, enjoying the breeze until the shark leaps up in the air. Where ever Don is, Charly Lary and Marly are sure to follow. Watch them battle sharks and take on the sea!

programme.title: CHOR POLICE
programme.desc: One fine morning, an evidently pea-brained police constable comes to hotel Kelifornia with a smart thief handcuffed to his hand. Basha is absolutely enjoying the funny difficulties the policeman faces while having food with the thief handcuffed to his hand; while Sundar is all respect for the policemen. Basha decides to up the fun by making the policemens life miserable; and Sundar is in running around protecting the policemen. But he causes more trouble than help. The mayhem reaches a crescendo when the smart thief gets to runs away when the handcuff breaks in the madness and in his place Sundar gets handcuffed to the policeman. And a fuming policeman whacks Sundar and runs behind the thief!Basha laughs innocently basking in his successful mischief!

programme.title: Flash Blind
programme.desc: Don rips apart the parcel and out comes A Brand New Camera! Don is on a clicking spree. He makes colonel pose and ends up clicking Ballu. From friends to enemies to the innards of his tummy, he captures it all.

programme.title: HYPNO-TACO
programme.desc: A new taco stand that has abruptly popped up overnight next to the tea shop. Strangely, though the tacos smell anything but tasty, the customers flock to it and Chai Raja sends Sundar to deal with matters. But that compounds the disaster as Sundar too turns his back at Chai Raja and starts guarding/waiting at the Taco stand with double his usual smartness! Though this gives Basha full freedom to raid the banana fries at the tea shop, Chai Rajas long face tugs at this heartstrings and Basha nips over to the taco stand to take a look at things. Thats when he realizes that the taco stand owner is in fact a rogue hypnotist from Bashas old circus who is literally hypnotizing the customers and Sundar to munch his Mexican lunch! Cracking his knuckles in glee, Basha sets about driving the rogue out of his mind and business. But a hypnotized Sunder is more powerful than ever, and Basha get whacked here and there in the ordeal. At last Basha gives a nice knock on Sundars head and he is back at the tea shop and Basha and Sundar together makes sure that the taco shop-owner runs for his dear life, much to Chai Rajas relief.

programme.title: Kites Away!
programme.desc: It all happens for a kite! Don wants it… the rats wont let it go. And in this tug of war, an angry and frustrated King Chomp is funnily pulled into. It is a bad time for the rats and a very bad time for Don and Colonel.

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: DEEP FRIED PRIDE
programme.desc: After discovering a powerful ancient mask that transforms him in to a (finally) formidable opponent, Mark turns on Durian and decides to pull rank

programme.title: Rainbow Show
programme.desc: Its the day of the Extreme Glow Rainbow. Zip wants to prove shes her own Smighty without her twin brother, Zap, so she grabs hold of the Air Stone which she cannot control. The Air region twists and turns and the Smighties need to be saved from the Villains trap.

programme.title: KALAI-TEA-TEA
programme.desc: Chai Raja is organizing a Kathakali performance in front of his teashop for a group of special guests in the evening. The Kathakali dancer is in the shop enjoying tea and snacks. In the crazy fight between Sundar and Basha, the dancers both legs gets bandaged and he runs away from the shop. Chai Raja catches Sundar in the act! Chai Raja is so angry and panicking. He decides that Sundar is going to dance Kathakali! Next we see a poor Sundar all dressed up in the Kathakali costume with his snout sticking out. The performance starts and Sundar doesnt know what to do. The naughty Basha still has no plans to leave poor Sundaralone. He tries to trips, tickle, push and irritate Sundar from the rafter of the stage. Sundar is running all over the stage musch to Bashas delight and Chai Rajas horror. But the special guests love Sundars performance and awards him with a trophy! Basha is stunnedand Sundar is thrilled beyond words!

programme.title: Hiccups
programme.desc: A pesky case of the hiccups defies the oddest attempts at curing it – and, in fact, proves more than a little contagious!

programme.title: Fly me to the Moon.
programme.desc: When Gummy admires how pretty the moon is up in the sky, he decides he wants to go there, and sets out to try and do just that in some pretty strange ways!

programme.title: FREAKY FRUIT
programme.desc: Deep in the dojo, the Fruit Ninjas discover some powerfully magical fruit, but their secret is discovered by the Clean Bee.

programme.title: Be a Friend, Make a Friend
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: A Merry Ride
programme.desc: The giant wheel whirs like a wind mill and rolls down the hill. The merry go round is more like a shooting brigade. This amusement park has rides and games with a twist, for Don, Colonel, Charly, Marly and Lary are all geared up to have a fun-filled outing!

programme.title: Roller-Skates.
programme.desc: Gummy decides to take up roller-skating – and everybody else’s world winds up being turned upside-down.

programme.title: Holiday Resort
programme.desc: Don and colonel are about to start their wonderful holiday in an elite resort. Instead, they don’t even spend a single peaceful second in the place. Thanks to the mad rats! At last when the dogs leave the resort, they plan a nasty trap for the rats. But the rats are too smarttt…..

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift – a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house – for the first time. But how???

programme.title: I Gotta Go !
programme.desc: Rise and Shine Don- it’s a normal morning at the Doggy household…but wait.. whats the mice upto in the bathroom…Looks like there is no way Don can start his day normally ever!

programme.title: Honey bees Attack
programme.desc: Cat is relaxing in a hammock under the coconut trees at the back of the house reading a newspaper item of an exotic insect whose sting can kill.

programme.title: The very good witch
programme.desc: The twins meet a little witch who has no friends because everyone is afraid of her.

programme.title: Sssshhhhh!!!
programme.desc: The twins use their joke kit to help a young Ice-witch with a cold to gain favour with her dour compatriots.

programme.title: Whirlwind
programme.desc: Deedee is sadly whirling the magic wand wondering what to do. But no matter what Nino suggests, Deedee wants to have the magical version of it all, be it baking a cake or even walking. Finally they decide on the giant jumble jigsaw. Inspite of Nino’s efforts to have a non-magic activity, Deedee’s magic seems to be only solution to tackling the over-sized pieces. But the spell literally whips up a storm. Deedee struggles to control the whirlwind, but it whizzes past out of control into the field ahead. The jigsaw pieces fall in place perfectly but the whirlwind hasn’t stopped. The whirlwind becomes so naughty that it snatches Deedee’s magic wand away. The whirlwind wildly knocks down everything in its path and throws out all the things inside Tiggy’s house. Not to mention the letters of postman Charlie. Even though all are shaken up pretty much by the naughty whirlwind, Deedee is encouraged by all her friends to catch it. The whirlwind even plays mischief with the Tika Pila monster and also the Mayor! The Mayor falls with a bump out of the whirlwind, but luckily with Deedee’s wand. They decide to wear-out the whirlwind safely without magic. They come up with a plan and together do their thing. The whirlwind gradually gets tired and so does the magic wear off. Although it messed up the town, all of them have quite a laugh.

programme.title: Slow down in tempo town
programme.desc: The twins are in a city where everyone lives in a frantic manner. They run fast from here and there, talking so fast that you do not understand anything. They must find a way to re-establish in the city a liveable rhythm

programme.title: LEMONAIDING THE ENEMY
programme.desc: Feeling sorry for Mark, the Ninjas throw him a bone. This almost backfires, however, when he unexpectedly returns accompanied by Durian and a gang of chumplings.

programme.title: Dinner Plans
programme.desc: A free entry pass into a posh hotel! What more do Don and Colonel need! But there is competition at the house. From the door of the limousine to the hotel roof top, the rats make it impossible for Don and Colonel to enjoy this rare luck of theirs. But, when in need, they all stand together. After all, what are friends for??!!

programme.title: Pool Off
programme.desc: Ever seen sharks in a swimming pool? The Rat-a-tat swimming pool has many such surprises including grenades, sharks and weights! Watch Colonel twist and turn to woo a hottie.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: Colour Chaos
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffel can’t decide what colour to paint the town hall as it is so dull and grey. So Deedee offers to help, without magic this time, by getting a town vote as to which colour is liked best. Deedee and Nino go ahead and do just that, asking each and everybody they see in Abra-Dabra and noting their choice of colours. Boris and Sandy are confused so set out to paint and decide, but end up messing up the wall. They seek the help of Deedee, who is all so ready to help. But Nino is scared things will get worse with the powerful magic spell, and with good reason. The spell not only “cleaned” Charlie’s wall but made grey stripes on the walls of every house in Abra-Dabra! Even Tiggy’s yellow house is all grey!! So Deedee and everybody else pitch in and paint every house back to its original colour. So the final building standing is the town hall, but no one has sufficient pain for any one colour. So they finally decide to paint it with every colour they have, like a rainbow!

programme.title: TREE TROUBLE
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to help with heavy gardening, much to Xia’s dismay. Negu sends a Giant Beaver Mutant to eat the Yan’s world trees, threatening its very survival. Pai has to master cooking Slippery Jade Noodles to get the Mutant to eat something besides trees.

programme.title: Snoring
programme.desc: Granny Peters’ loud snoring winds up keeping Gummy, Harry and Kala awake – and trying whatever schemes they can think of to somehow stop it!

programme.title: SWITCHING PLACES
programme.desc: After arguing about whose avatar is more difficult to control, Xia and April swap magic accessories. Xia becomes the Panther Warrior and April becomes the Dragon Warrior. Unfortunately, just as they’re struggling to control each other’s avatars, Negu’s latest mutant attacks: his beloved pet “cat,” Kanna. The Guardians manage to capture Kanna, so Mei, Koto, and Amkko race to the Yan World to retrieve her – which is just what the Guardians want!

programme.title: Paint It Back
programme.desc: Odessa gets angry when her chalk drawing is ruined by a rainstorm. In the Zooniverse, she discovers that all the color has drained away, and she and the Zoonicorns must "paint" the hues back. In the process, she discovers methods to manage her anger and frustration. How to manage anger and frustration in a positive manner.

programme.title: A new nose
programme.desc: The twins use a flashlight to solve a problem for a self-conscious little snowman.

programme.title: Yes Gummy
programme.desc: Feeling a little ‘blah’, Gummy decides to say ‘yes’ to everything that crosses his path. Comic disaster, naturally, soon follows...

programme.title: Mr. Pancake's Wild Ride
programme.desc: Pancake doesn’t follow instructions and goes on a wild joy ride! Understanding and following directions is important.

programme.title: A Zoonicorn Followed Me Home
programme.desc: When Odessa can’t take a trip to visit her grandmother, a visit from the Zoonicorns inspires her to rediscover the wonderful things there are to do around her very own home. Appreciating that everyday things can be and are special.

programme.title: Rowdy Cloudy
programme.desc: When Pancake angers a cloud by not listening, the livid cumulus vents its anger by taking Pancake on a wild ride, storming all over the Zooniverse. An apology, when sincere, can help make things right.

programme.title: A Slice Of Fun
programme.desc: Ding Dong. It’s the pizza delivery boy. Don pays the cash and open’s the box to find only leftover olives and baby corn! Sad and dejected, he decides to make his own pizza, but is tricked by Lary Marly and Charly as always!

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: Frozen
programme.desc: Gummy’s place is transformed into a frozen world, where he, Harry and Kala have loads of slippery fun together while trying to figure out what’s happened in the hopes of fixing it.

programme.title: Brother Ogre – Puss In Boots Case 2
programme.desc: SANDRA and FO travel into the story of PUSS IN BOOTS, having been called out by his fiancée, a very refined cat who is the pet of the PRINCESS in the story. The wedding between the MARQUIS OF CARABAS and the PRINCESS is very close, but the MARQUIS and his CAT have disappeared. SANDRA and FO go to the OGRE’s castle in which the quick-witted cat and his master now live, and discover that a second OGRE, the brother of the first one, who PUSS IN BOOTS ate after convincing him to turn himself into a mouse, has imprisoned inside the castle.

programme.title: BIG BUNNY
programme.desc: The Elders assign the Guardians to prepare a big feast. Pai sees this as his chance to impress the Elders and earn a new weapon to replace his Mystic Stick. But when he goes to collect the rare striped carrot (a crucial ingredient for his dish), he’s attacked by a Giant Bunny Mutant sent by Negu. His Mystic Stick helps him defeat the Mutant, so he’s content with his weapon…for now.

programme.title: Dunky's Laundry
programme.desc: GrandPa has entrusted Dunky to get his special Yellow shirt washed and ironed ready. Meanwhile a funny sequence of events and chase is happening between Cat and Keet.

programme.title: A Fog of A Different Color
programme.desc: When the Foggy messes with the Zoonicorns colors, Maple learns that the appearance of a thing does not define what it is. It’s not what’s on the outside that makes a thing/person what it is, but what’s on the inside

programme.title: “Cuppa” Chase
programme.desc: Don is pouring HOT TEA into his cup from a kettle.He takes the cup and sits down at the table.OPENS the newspaper and begins to read. But as he raises the cup for a sip, all the tea is gone. Its Don chasing the mice all the way, in hopes to have a peaceful tea break!

programme.title: A Star Is Jumped
programme.desc: Odessa learns to leap over stars by starting on low ones,Persistence pays off, especially when you learn from each step along the way, building up to the final goal.

programme.title: Mom-Bot
programme.desc: When Fred’s parents leave him home alone, he tries to throw the coolest party in history—until Principal Darling checks up on him. Friday replicates Fred’s mom, and Mombot puts the Principal at ease, before short-circuiting, and making the party extremely uncool.

programme.title: Sneaky Genie
programme.desc: When the Dude finds a bottle on the beach, he uncorks it and finds a genie. But instead of granting wishes, this genie turns out to be Sneevil who steals all of the Smighty Stones. The Super Six must combine forces to turn the tables on Sneevil!

programme.title: Petunias – Snow White Case 3
programme.desc: SANDRA and her assistant, FO, travel into the story of SNOW WHITE, where they find her and the 7 DWARVES asleep around the table. The lethal apple has mysteriously fallen into the soup cauldron and they have all been poisoned. SANDRA comes up with a possible solution: to find, in addition to the PRINCE, 7 DWARF PRINCESSES capable of awaking the DWARVES with a kiss of love. The evil STEPMOTHER will do everything she can to prevent her.

programme.title: Catch That Bird
programme.desc: Don has adopted a baby pigeon, but can he save it from 5 grumbling tummies? The three mice, Balu and Colonel are adamant on having baby pigeon pie and a mighty havoc ensues. But the kin & kith of the little pigeon have other plans and you have to watch to find out who ultimately ends up on the stove!

programme.title: Perfect Scoop
programme.desc: Biggs tampers with Nardys newest invention, an ice cream making robot. Will Nardy be able to stop him before all of Smightyland is covered in frozen treats?

programme.title: Diver Bros
programme.desc: Don and colonel are in a boat getting ready for sea diving. And anything can happen in water. Or else larry charly and marly will make sure that anything would happen. Every single creature in the turns against them and the dogs run for their life.

programme.title: Whoops Elujah
programme.desc: When Ene messes up building a playset, it turns out to be even more fun than the original, Pancake learns a lesson about “When the world gives you lemons....”. Mistakes are just unexpected surprises.

programme.title: The Big Freeze
programme.desc: Charlie is found napping on the job. Deedee and Nino encourage him as being the best postman ever and that anyone would doze off in the sweltering heat. Charlie assures Tiggy that he will take special care of Tiggy’s parcel and off he goes near fainting in the sweaty heat. Charlie even turns down the twins offer to help. In the heat, Charlie makes a wrong turn and reaches town-hall instead of Tiggy’s home, but still presses on to accomplish his mission. En route the special package starts to leak unawares of Charlie who is too tired and stops for a “quick” nap after nearly bumping into the Doobydoos. Deedee and Nino are searching for Charlie and find him at long last. Dejected, Charlie calls himself the worst postman in the world having melted all of Tiggy’s vanilla ice-cream. Charlie wishes Deedee to use her magic, much to the horror of Nino who hides off. Deedee’s magic refreezes not only the ice-cream, but Charlie as well! Rounding up Deedee’s friends they all take turns in delivering the letters and special parcel to keep Charlie’s goodwill intact. Mewmew is too fast that the letters fly our of the bag and the Doobydoos are too short to reach the mail boxes and the twins have a tough time reading the addresses. Finally all the tired and thoroughly perspired friends acknowledge how great Charlie is as a postman. As Charlie is now free to move, they are all surprised by Tiggy’s special delivery of ice-creams he specially made for him favourite postman. Charlie gets a well deserved nap right in front of his giggling friends.

programme.title: Baghdad in Bloom
programme.desc: Aladdin buys magic seeds from the market with the food money believing the plant will bring him riches. However when it doesnt grow he and Jamillah enlist Genie to help, he does his thing and suddenly the plant grows! Everyone in town hears about the plant and comes to see it in Aladdins garden - hoping that they too will get blessed with riches. Even the Sultan comes to see its beauty. The crowd waits with bated breath but when it opens - it stinks like smelly cheese. The crowd disperse but the Sultan is transfixed by the rare scent. He sees the value and beauty in it where others dont and gives Aladdin gold in exchange for the plant.

programme.title: Swimming Class
programme.desc: Dunky wants to learn swimming so goes to the lake with a tyre tube with Keet who is helping looking at the swimming manual to tell him how to swim.

programme.title: Detective Duda
programme.desc: Scot receives a special pair of underwear at his home. He puts it on and goes to sleep, excited to show it to his friends the next day. But when he wakes up, he discovers that he had a small accident. Afraid that his friends would make fun of him, he goes to dry his underwear, but the wind blows it away to Pinkar. Meanwhile, Dadas watch has disappeared. Duda plays detective and tries to solve the mystery. However, when the friends catch Scot on top of Pinkar, they jump to conclusions and accuse him of taking the watch. Scot, embarrassed to tell them the truth, runs away. Its up to Duda to get to the bottom of things. Will Detective Duda solve the case and save the day?

programme.title: A Smelly Taco Surprise
programme.desc: Nardy makes a Taco Surprise which gives Zap a bad case of smelly gas. Will the embarrassed Smighty help when Sneevil rides into Smightyland in his gigantic Bowling Boulder Ball?

programme.title: An Alien Visit
programme.desc: It’s a nice cold night and Keet is resting on the terrace of the house enjoying the night stars. Suddenly a small space ship crash lands on the terrace and a cute little alien the same size of Keet comes out.

programme.title: Rest-O-War
programme.desc: A cookbook open on his left, and tears in his eyes as Don chops onions. Colonel is the new restaurateur, and Don the head chef. All the food is being diverted into the trio tummies. Frustrated of waiting, would the customers ever be served?

programme.title: Doobydoo Meep Concert
programme.desc: The annual Doobydoo Meep concert is about to take place, and Charlie wants to practice one last time before heading out. So Deedee chips in by agreeing to follow specific instructions to organise the difficult to manage Doobydoos but also promises not to use magic for anything at all. Deedee mixes up the sandwiches for the Doodyboos with the recorders that she ends up sending off with Mewmew. Nino constantly keeps Deedee in check so that she doesn’t back out of her promise. Mewmew is having a tough time organising with the Doobydoos while Deedee finds out Charlie has slept of practising. The concert goes well, but they all decide they won’t have lullabies ever again.

programme.title: Hopeless Dreams
programme.desc: Cat is taking a cat nap as Keet flies in and bangs a pan on Cats head and wakes him up. Cat gets up in a start and amazed by what he sees.

programme.title: Lucky Charm
programme.desc: Gummy acquires what he thinks is a lucky charm – and soon becomes foolishly fearless, thinking his ‘good luck’ will protect him.

programme.title: Mewmew And The Beanstalk
programme.desc: Mewmew is setting up his garden in such a way to get a Gardening Star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Usually Tiggy wins them every year and he’s optimistic to win it this year as well. As Tiggy says the secret lies in the beans, Mewmew rushes off to freshly plant exactly that from just seeds. But Mewmew is impatient to wait till next year which calls for Deedee’s magic. Deedee puts a spell of ‘grow faster’ on the beans making them sprout soon enough. The next morning Mayor De Pfeffle polishes the Gardening Star to a shining bright sparkle, then sets off to inspect. Deedee and Nino find Mewmew trapped in her house strangled tight by huge beanstalks. The only way to pry her free would be to pluck all the beans off the stalks thanks to Tiggy’s suggestion on what to do. But though Mewmew didn’t have much of a garden, hew friends were able to put up a fabulous rock garden that got Mewmew a special recognition star from Mayor De Pfeffle. Just then Tiggy comes along with his special bean soup, much to the delight of everyone, except Mewmew who is a bit overloaded with seeing so many beans that day.

programme.title: Contra viento y marea
programme.desc: Tras pasar siete años en la cárcel por asesinato, Dina logra demostrar su inocencia y obtener su libertad.

programme.title: Soul Detective
programme.desc: "An officer from the underworld joins forces with a policeman to track down evil spirits that have escaped to the mortal realm. Together, they explore the good and evil of human nature. This drama combines traditional and modern elements to bring a new fantasy experience to the audience. "

programme.title: Love At First Bite
programme.desc: Xi Yue, a staunch believer of fate, meets the rational and cold Martius whom she believes bring her bad luck. Unknown to her, Martius has been quietly helping Xi Yue achieve her culinary dream.

programme.title: Love At First Bite

programme.title: 20 Days
programme.desc: Everyone views singlehood differently. For Edrick ( Elvin Ng) , it is the pain of not being able to find the right girl. As for his brother, Wesley (Nat Ho) , it signifies a life of freedom. Yet for Edrick’s best friend Jess (Felicia Chin), she simply blames her old-fashioned mother, who forced her to focus on her studies instead.

programme.title: Incredible Tales 8
programme.desc: The Spooktacular series, Incredible Tales featuring the paranormal encounters of ordinary people, returns for an 8th installment.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: The Conceited General
programme.desc: Set in ancient China. After a great victory, the general becomes complacent and out of practice. When the enemy returns, he acts like a punk.

programme.title: Shuteye Popeye 1952
programme.desc: Popeye's snoring is keeping his resident mouse awake. The mouse fights back. Popeye makes a mistake: he traps the mouse in a spinach can that isn't completely empty.

programme.title: I Don't Scare 1956
programme.desc: Popeye has beaten Bluto to a date with Olive. Seeing that Olive is superstitious, Bluto changes the date to Friday the 13th, and proceeds to rig various proofs that bad things will happen if she goes out.

programme.title: Parlez Vous Woo 1956
programme.desc: Olive is so captived by "The International", a radio personality with a French accent, that she'd rather stay home than go out on a date with Popeye. Bluto, overhearing this, comes to the door as the character. Popeye does his best to get Olive back, to no avail. Finally, Bluto challenges Popeye to a duel, ultimately stabbing him in the chest where his can of spinach was. Popeye unmasks Bluto, then eats another can of spinach to give himself a French accent.

programme.title: Me Musical Nephews 1942
programme.desc: Popeye's nephews have been practicing their music and are getting good, but it's bedtime. After Popeye puts them to bed, they discover that many of the things in their bedroom can also be used to make music. And they are also blessed with an uncanny ability to appear to sleep every time Popeye comes to check on them

programme.title: Jungle Drums 1943
programme.desc: Superman vs. a secret Nazi outpost disguised as a jungle temple.

programme.title: A Haul in One 1956
programme.desc: Popeye and Bluto are, believe it or not, pals and partners in a moving company. (Maybe it's because Popeye isn't squinting here.) Anyhow, Olive has made the mistake of hiring them. She hasn't finished packing yet, so the boys, smitten as soon as she answers the door, compete to help her. Once packed, they compete to move more impressive piles of her belongings. Popeye easily wins these contests, even though Bluto locks him in the van at one point. At the end, Bluto socks Popeye into the piano, then into a table; though he hardly seems to need it, Popeye still eats his spinach, then thrashes Bluto.

programme.title: Felix the Cat - Felix in Holly wood -1923
A Date to Skate 1938
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive roller skating in a rink; she's never skated before, so he has to teach her, and she's not exactly a quick learner. After a while, she ends up outside the rink, and still out of control; she skates through a department store and causes major traffic problems. When she gets stuck on a speeding fire truck, Popeye realizes he'll need his spinach, but he's out fortunately, an audience member tosses him a can.

programme.title: Felix Lends a Hand 1922
programme.desc: Trudging through the snow in his hometown, Felix sees a billboard advertising sunny Egypt, and says that he'd give four of his nine lives to be there rather than freezing in the snow. He then hears crying coming from his friend Abdul's carpet shop, and it turns out that Abdul's girlfriend has been kidnapped by an Egyptian sheik. Felix promises to rescue her, and hops on a magic carpet Abdul has lying around the shop, says the magic word and flies off to Egypt to keep his promise.

programme.title: April Maze-1930
programme.desc: Felix the Cat and his two nephews try to have a picnic, but a thunderstorm and a thieving rabbit prevent them.

programme.title: Ride Him, Bosko -1931
programme.desc: BosKo in the Wild West, tries to have fun with any situation that come in his way.

programme.title: Boom Boom-1936
programme.desc: World War I, apparently. There is a series of quick blackout gags, including a soldier that throws the pin, is blown sky-high by the grenade, and is caught in a net by an ambulance driver; one soldier's encounters with very smart bullets; a machine gunner with the jitters. Porky leads a charge, but with no support from his company, he runs back and dives under Beans' bunk. After a quick chorus of "You're in the Army Now," a messenger pigeon drops in with news that General Hardtack is being held prisoner. They dash off in a motorcycle/sidecar, chased by another smart bullet, and arrive in the nick of time to dispatch the general's captors. They fly off in a plane and get shot down to end up together in the hospital.

programme.title: Scotty Finds a Home 1935
programme.desc: A young anthropomorphic kitten wants a pet. He happens to find a puppy with no owner and takes him in. When the Scotty tracks mud into the house, Grandma says that her grandson cannot keep him. A transient bulldog is walking by as Grandma puts a pie in the windowsill to cool. He barges into the house and terrorizes the family, demanding they feed him. Scotty rushes back to the house and saves the family, causing Grandma to decide that they can keep him after all.

programme.title: Me Feelins is Hurt 1940
programme.desc: Olive writes a letter to Popeye: she's through with sailors; it's cowboys for her. Popeye immediately sails off to the West, where he finds, who else, Bluto as the head of the ranch where Olive is enthralled. Bluto gives Popeye a wild horse to ride, and, after a few humiliating defeats, Popeye conquers it (and wins back Olive's heart). Bluto punches Popeye out, and into the clutches of what can best be described as a rattlesnake constrictor. Bluto then starts menacing Olive, so Popeye eats his spinach, saves her, and defeats Bluto and his gang.

programme.title: Fox Pop 1942
programme.desc: Hearing that silver foxes are all the rage in high society, a fox paints himself silver and gets himself trapped, finding out too late that it's only his fur anyone is interested in

programme.title: Boo Moon
programme.desc: Casper emerges from a subway station, following a crowd of scared strangers. He encounters a man saying "see the wonders of the moon for ten cents," and offering a sight through a telescope. Casper scares the man away, then uses the telescope to see the moon. He then flies to the moon for a visit. Casper lands on the moon, disappointed to find no man on the moon. He lies down to nap, then tiny moon men emerge from holes. They capture Casper, like Lilliputians did to Gulliver, then place him in a cage on wheels, in which they tow him to the Ruler of the Moon, King Luna. The King addresses Casper as a monster, and treats him as an enemy. Casper playfully picks up King Luna, and the king has him placed in the royal dungeon. A dejected Casper is imprisoned. Then animated trees attack the city of the moon men. The moon men defend their fortified city with flaming missiles. The tree monsters fight back with water, then break through the town walls. When the fight seems lost to the tree monsters, Casper escapes his cage, and helps the moon men. Casper goes underground. The friendly ghost then pulls trees' parts through the moon surface and ties them together, immobilizing the trees. The frustrated trees writhe and strain against the knots Casper has tied. Casper and the moon men have won. Then, and only then, does King Luna embrace Casper as a friend. King Luna knights Casper for the valiant defense of his people. Then all the moon men join in singing the Casper theme song.

programme.title: A Ham in a Role 1949
programme.desc: A Shakespearian dog, tired of being a pie-in-the-face looney tune, quits Warner Brothers to study dramatic acting and goes to his country house to practice the bard. He finds that two polite twin gophers have taken over his abode and angrily throws them out. They retaliate by violently heckling him in comical accordance with his Shakespeare speeches.

programme.title: You Can't Shoe a Horse Fly 1940
programme.desc: Hunky and Spunky are settling in for a nap, but a horse fly sees them and sees dinner. After battling the fly for a while, the youngster enlists dad's help. But the fly is merely stunned, and rallies a new attack, this time with friends. Father eventually kills the lot of them

programme.title: Small Fry-1939
programme.desc: Junior wants to be a Big Fry, but learns the hard way that he just isn't ready for smoking in the pool room when he should be in the school room.

programme.title: Superman: Billion Dollar Limited-1950
programme.desc: Superman battles train robbers seeking to steal a billion dollars worth of gold.

programme.title: Big Business-1924
programme.desc: In need of some fun (and a haircut), rich kid Mickie pays a visit to the gang's barbershop.

programme.title: The Face on the Barroom Floor - 1914
programme.desc: The plot is a satire derived from Hugh Antoine D'Arcy's poem of the same title. The painter courts Madeleine but loses to the wealthy client who sits for his portrait. The despairing artist draws the girl's portrait on the barroom floor and gets tossed out. Years later he sees her, her husband and their horde of children. Unrecognized by her, Charlie shakes off his troubles and walks off into the future.

programme.title: Those Love Pangs -1914
programme.desc: Charlie and a rival vie for the favors of their landlady. In the park they each fall for different girls, though Charlie's has a male friend already. Charlie considers suicide, is talked out of it by a policeman, and later throws his girl's friend into the lake. Frightened, the girls go off to a movie. Charlie shows up there and flirts with them. Later both rivals substitute themselves for the girls and attack the unwitting Charlie. In an audience-wide fight, Charlie is tossed through the screen.

programme.title: The Goat 1921
programme.desc: A series of adventures begins when an accident during photographing causes Buster to be mistaken for Dead Shot Dan, the local bad guy.

programme.title: The Dick Van Dyke Show 1962 ;season 2; The Night the Roof Fell In
programme.desc: Having each had a rough day, Laura and Rob argue, but only their goldfish can report the truth as Laura and Rob later tell colorful, self-aggrandizing versions to others of what happened.

programme.title: Hop to It, Bellhop 1919
programme.desc: Two hotel bell hops get into all kinds of shenanigans between dames, baths and bags of loot.

programme.title: His Double Life-1933
programme.desc: Priam Farrel is a celebrated artist but a social recluse. When his valet dies of a sudden illness, a mix-up leads to the body being identified as Farrel's. The timid artist then assumes the identity of his former servant, but finds himself faced with constant dilemmas as a result.

programme.title: Making a Living 1914
programme.desc: An out-of-work swindler takes a job as a reporter. After witnessing a car go over cliff, he grabs a rival reporter's camera and races to the newspaper office to enter the photo as his own. His rival is delayed when he gets caught in a woman's bedroom by her jealous husband. The swindler follows the distribution of the paper containing his 'scoop' around town where he is once again chased by the rival reporter. Both end up on the cow-catcher of a streetcar

programme.title: The Rink by Charlie Chaplin 1916
programme.desc: After causing restaurant chaos at work, a bumbling waiter tears up the local roller rink with his skating.

programme.title: A Distant Place
programme.desc: After settling down at a sheep ranch in Hwacheon five years ago, Jin-woo has been raising his niece Seol like his own daughter with his same-sex partner Hyun-min. One day, Jin-woo's twin sister Eun-young who is the birth mother of Seol turns up at their doorstep and insists on taking Seol with her. As Jin-woo hesitates to send Seol to Eun-young, Eun-young, out of anger, discloses his relationship with Hyun-min in front of Jin-woo's neighbors.

programme.title: Wood Day on the Trapline

programme.title: The Eastern Cape of South Africa
programme.desc: This week on Americana Outdoors, we're on a journey back to South Africa where we'll take a look at a variety of adventures and what goes on behind the scenes on some hunts.

programme.title: Axis Hunting and a Waterbuck Adventure in South Africa
programme.desc: This week on Americana Outdoors, we're going to join Jeff Reynolds as he goes on a dream hunt for an axis buck and then we'll journey back to South Africa with Wade Middleton as he goes back into the field in search of a waterbuck.

programme.title: Hog Hunts and a Big Ten Point
programme.desc: This week on Americana Outdoors, we look at all the ways that you can hunt hogs and then we'll go on a whitetail adventure with Brian Flaherty of TenPoint Crossbows where he's going to encounter his best buck ever.

programme.title: Arctic Char: Tree River Staycation - Part 2
programme.desc: After a good night’s rest in the pouring rain, we head out early up river to the famous Presidential Falls and then back onto the hunt for an Arctic Char in full spawning colors.

programme.title: Lake Trout - Great Slave Lake
programme.desc: We take in the last morning of fishing before the long 300km boat ride home to Yellowknife, NT. The fish are not done yet and we get to show you what not to do, when battling a giant lake trout to the boat!

programme.title: Shore Fishn Northern Pike
programme.desc: Its September and Ryan jumps back into the boat with Captain Andrew Moore and they head out on another personal bucket list adventure for the elusive Inconnu and some giant pike.

programme.title: Among Us UFO Witnesses And Whistleblowers
Guests Deja Dupart, Precious G, Morgan Brock
programme.desc: Yonathan Elias is joined by Deja Dupart, Precious G and Morgan Brock, who play Couch Party for the Culture and for cash!

programme.title: Naufragio
programme.desc: Mientras transportaba un paquete importante, una joven sufre un accidente de coche en medio de la nada, dejándola atrapada debajo del coche. Poco a poco, se da cuenta de que no solo unos hombres muy malvados la persiguen para recuperar el objeto que transporta, sino que algo muy peligroso la acecha desde las profundidades del bosque...

programme.title: El Juego del Duende
programme.desc: Después de que un hombre adinerado envía a un grupo de ladrones a buscar leyendas urbanas con la intención de abrir un museo lleno de criaturas míticas, pronto descubrirán la leyenda de un duende...

programme.title: Verano Sangriento
programme.desc: Cuatro jóvenes llegan a Mallorca para disfrutar de unas idílicas vacaciones de verano, pero adentrándose en los lugares más inhóspitos de la isla comenzarán un viaje infernal...

programme.title: Calvario "El Bien y El Mal"
programme.desc: En esta vida hay dos modos de vivir, el del bien y el del mal, paralelo y horizontal, esta historia llena de drama, acción y suspenso nos lleva a estos dos lados casi siempre elegimos voluntariamente pero en un conflicto entre la vida y la muerte y por salvar la vida llegas a traicionar a tu mejor amigo sin saber que la vida da vueltas.

programme.title: Bendita Suerte
programme.desc: En la provincia de Oaxaca vive Pedro después de la muerte de su mamá decide de salir de su pueblo para buscar algo mejor ya que no tiene a nadie, se va al pueblo de Ixtapaluca, México. empieza a trabajar muy duro para vivir su sueño de ser cantante. Pero la vida le tiene muchas sorpresas

programme.title: 500 Años de Carcel
programme.desc: En Baja California viven un grupo de delincuentes Gerardo, Clemente, Valdemar, y Benjamin el líder del grupo Christian tiene todo el pueblo bajo control, y sus colegas tienen negocios limpios para que la ley no sospeche nada. Para trabajar en paz compran al jefe de la policía del pueblo, pero no todo lo que brilla es oro ya que las esposas y amantes de estos narcotraficantes están cansadas de las humillaciones de sus parejas, y con la ayuda del comandante planean una venganza mortal.

programme.title: El Director (Las Siete Madres de Edipo)
programme.desc: Dos jóvenes estudiantes de actuación siguiendo sus sueños se embarcan en un proyecto para filmar una película de terror que no resulta ser lo que esperaban.

programme.title: Buenas Noches, Dijo La Señorita Pájaro
programme.desc: Un adulterio, un secreto familiar, un asesino en serie. Una historia fabricada con estructura de muñecas rusas y con ritmo de montañas rusas. El espectador busca una barandilla a la que agarrarse, pero sólo encuentra cuchillos. La carrera artística de Sonia, una joven actriz de teatro, empieza a despegar al tiempo que intenta mantener a flote la relación sentimental que la une a Óscar, casado, a su vez, con la hija de un poderoso empresario. Por otro lado la policía investiga los crímenes de un asesino en serie que envía fotografías comprometidas a sus víctimas antes de acabar con ellas. Sonia acaba de recibir una de esas fotografías...Un asesino en serie del que tan solo vemos sus manos enfundadas en unos guantes de cuero, las pistas falsas, los falsos culpables, gestos y detalles que pasan prácticamente inadvertidos pero que acabaran siendo cruciales, haciendo partícipes a los espectadores del juego, el trauma infantil que sobrevuela constantemente la trama, la pareja de policías que siempre van un paso por detrás del asesino

programme.title: El Tirabeque
programme.desc: Sebas es redactor de un periódico digital que nadie lee, está en trámites de divorcio y tiene problemas con el alcohol. Toda su vida se desmorona hasta que le encargan un reportaje sobre los tirabeques. Lo que en un inicio parecía un trabajo tranquilo se convertirá en una investigación de consecuencias impredecibles.

programme.title: Soy Una Buena Persona
programme.desc: Sabina es una treintañera muy "artista" convencida de que podrá algún día vivir de su arte como diseñadora, actriz, guionista o directora, porque ella está destinada a petarlo. Mientras, como casi toda su generación, malvive gorroneando en casa de sus padres. Pero una noche tiene, por desgracia ajena, una oportunidad de lujo... y no dudará en aprovecharla sin pensárselo demasiado.

programme.title: El Cóndor En Nueva York
programme.desc: Un narcotraficante de Nueva York, llamado Damián, ha creado una nueva droga con efectos impactantes. Después de varias muertes accidentales, la DEA y la policía se embarcan en una búsqueda inútil en busca de este jefe de la mafia. Damián comienza a derrotar a su competencia con la ayuda de su científico privado y un informante de la DEA. El hijo del alcalde Martínez (de Súper Cóndor) queda en coma tras consumir el nuevo medicamento. El alcalde Martínez vuela a Nueva York desde Perú para comenzar su propia investigación en busca de Damián y una cura. Todo parece sombrío para los agentes de la DEA, el alcalde Martínez y su hijo; hasta que llegue la ayuda. El Cóndor llega a Nueva York desde Perú para ayudar a revertir los efectos de esta nueva y brutal droga y llevar a Damián ante la justicia.

programme.title: Insignis
programme.desc: La vida de Jorge y Felipe, dos jóvenes amigos, da un vuelco del día que encuentran un cráneo enterrado en el jardín de uno de ellos. Comienza entonces una espiral de extraños acontecimientos, marcados por intensos sueños y oscuras apariciones, que acosan a los dos protagonistas y a las personas que les rodean. La decisión de tomar cartas en el asunto e intentar contactar con las fuerzas que han despertado, sólo servirá para llevarlos a un mundo de horror y agonía del cual no hay retorno.

programme.title: God Gave It To Me
programme.desc: God has given you everything you need for the battle you’re facing. When you refocus on Him rather than what He’s given you, He sustains you through weariness to bring you to victory.

programme.title: What Can God Do With Damage?
programme.desc: No matter what you’ve lost, the value is still in you. In “What Can God Do With Damage?,” Pastor Michael Todd reminds us that God can take what’s damaged and do a miracle that no one can disqualify.

programme.title: Where You Meet With God
programme.desc: Don’t go for a goal without God this year. When you invite His presence in, He’ll be with you every step of the way, bringing things to the surface, and showing you what to reach for.

programme.title: When You Just Can't Win
programme.desc: If you’re feeling stuck in a cycle of defeat, remember that God’s promises are guaranteed but not automatic. Keep consistently showing up and praising Him for the victories He’s given you, because more are on the way.
